name: MEANDERS
description: MEANDERS is a sparkling adventure through a series of funny and relaxing challenges in a colourful setting.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: Core i3 / AMD A6 2.4Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 240 / AMD Radeon HD 4670 / Intel HD Graphics 4000 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Core i5 / AMD FX 2.4Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 470 / AMD Radeon HD 6870 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
